title.en: Urban Region Pre-training and Prompting: A Graph-based Approach
title.zh: 城市区域预训练与提示：一种基于图的方法

conference.en: ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD 2025)
conference.zh: ACM SIGKDD知识发现与数据挖掘会议 (KDD 2025)

abstract.en: This paper presents a graph-based approach for urban region pre-training and prompting, advancing the state-of-the-art in urban spatial-temporal data analysis.
abstract.zh: 本文提出了一种基于图的城市区域预训练和提示方法，推进了城市时空数据分析的最先进技术。

title.en: IM-POI: Bridging ID and Multi-modal Representations for Next POI Recommendation
title.zh: IM-POI：桥接ID和多模态表示的下一个兴趣点推荐

abstract.en: This work proposes IM-POI, a novel approach that bridges ID and multi-modal representations for next point-of-interest recommendation.
abstract.zh: 这项工作提出了IM-POI，一种桥接ID和多模态表示的新颖方法，用于下一个兴趣点推荐。

title.en: Riding the Wave: Multi-Scale Spatial-Temporal Graph Learning for Highway Traffic Flow Prediction Under Overload Scenarios
title.zh: 驾驭浪潮：过载场景下高速公路交通流预测的多尺度时空图学习

conference.en: International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence (IJCAI 2025)
conference.zh: 国际人工智能联合会议 (IJCAI 2025)

abstract.en: This paper addresses the challenge of highway traffic flow prediction under overload scenarios using multi-scale spatial-temporal graph learning.
abstract.zh: 本文使用多尺度时空图学习来解决过载场景下高速公路交通流预测的挑战。

title.en: Exploring Multimodal Relation Extraction of Hierarchical Tabular Data with Multi-task Learning
title.zh: 探索基于多任务学习的层次表格数据多模态关系提取

conference.en: Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL 2025)

abstract.en: This research explores multimodal relation extraction from hierarchical tabular data using multi-task learning approaches.
abstract.zh: 本研究探索使用多任务学习方法从层次表格数据中进行多模态关系提取。

title.en: Rule-Based Graph Cleaning with GPUs on a Single Machine
title.zh: 基于规则的GPU单机图清理

conference.en: ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD 2025)
conference.zh: ACM SIGMOD数据管理国际会议 (SIGMOD 2025)

abstract.en: This paper presents a rule-based approach for graph cleaning using GPUs on a single machine, achieving significant performance improvements.
abstract.zh: 本文提出了一种基于规则的GPU单机图清理方法，实现了显著的性能提升。

title.en: MiniClean: A Single-Machine System for Cleaning Big Graphs
title.zh: MiniClean：一个用于清理大图的单机系统

conference.en: ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD 2025 Demo)
conference.zh: ACM SIGMOD数据管理国际会议 (SIGMOD 2025 Demo)

abstract.en: MiniClean is a single-machine system designed for cleaning large-scale graphs efficiently.
abstract.zh: MiniClean是一个专为高效清理大规模图而设计的单机系统。

title.en: Advancing Deep Learning Applications in Computer Vision: A Comprehensive Survey
title.zh: 推进深度学习在计算机视觉中的应用：全面综述

journal.en: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence
journal.zh: IEEE模式分析与机器智能汇刊

abstract.en: This comprehensive survey presents the latest advances in deep learning applications for computer vision tasks...
abstract.zh: 这篇全面综述介绍了深度学习在计算机视觉任务中的最新进展...

title.en: Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: Novel Approaches for Secure Data Collaboration
title.zh: 隐私保护机器学习：安全数据协作的新方法

conference.en: Proceedings of the 41st International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML)
conference.zh: 第41届国际机器学习会议论文集

abstract.en: We propose novel cryptographic approaches for privacy-preserving machine learning in collaborative settings...
abstract.zh: 我们提出了用于协作环境中隐私保护机器学习的新颖密码学方法...

title.en: Human-Centered AI: Designing Ethical and Trustworthy Intelligent Systems
title.zh: 以人为本的人工智能：设计道德可信的智能系统

abstract.en: This paper presents a framework for designing human-centered AI systems that prioritize ethical considerations...
abstract.zh: 本文提出了一个设计以人为本的人工智能系统的框架，该框架优先考虑伦理因素...

title.en: Efficient Large-Scale Data Processing with Novel Distributed Computing Framework
title.zh: 使用新型分布式计算框架进行高效大规模数据处理

conference.en: Proceedings of ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data
conference.zh: ACM SIGMOD数据管理国际会议论文集

abstract.en: We introduce a novel distributed computing framework for efficient processing of large-scale datasets...
abstract.zh: 我们介绍了一个用于高效处理大规模数据集的新颖分布式计算框架...

title.en: Enhancing User Experience through Adaptive Interface Design: A Machine Learning Approach
title.zh: 通过自适应界面设计增强用户体验：一种机器学习方法

abstract.en: This study presents a machine learning approach for creating adaptive interfaces that respond to user behavior...
abstract.zh: 本研究提出了一种创建响应用户行为的自适应界面的机器学习方法...
